form.label: Plays
form.description: Information on tracks played on specified mount point over the selected time period.

search.query: [ rest /services/configs/conf-inputs | where 'eai:acl.app'="icecast_app" | fields index ] sourcetype=icecast-error | fields mountpoint | dedup mountpoint

[ rest /services/configs/conf-inputs | where 'eai:acl.app'="icecast_app" | fields index ] sourcetype=icecast-error event_type=metadata-s* mountpoint=$mountpoint$ | eval hour = strftime(_time, "%H"), day = lower(strftime(_time, "%A")) | lookup schedule.csv time as hour | eval showname = case(day = "sunday", sunday, day = "monday", monday, day = "tuesday", tuesday, day = "wednesday", wednesday, day = "thursday", thursday, day = "friday", friday, day = "saturday", saturday) | rename metadata_value as Song | stats count, values(showname) as "Shows Played On" by Song
